name: Shores
description:
This was made in a week for the November 2017 UE4 Megajam and is based on the theme "However vast the darkness, we must supply our own light".

Only lit areas can be stood on. Pick up and place lights to get through the level. E/LMB/Right Trigger/ Left Face Button to pick up and place lights.

Premade assets: The game is based on the First Person Shooter example project and the lightbulb model uses the burnished steel material and a modified glass material from the starter content in the FPS example project. It also uses the red crosshair from the FPS example project. Everything else was created by me during the jam.
